data.title: Ariana Federico Mondragon on LinkedIn: Jobs at Mid
data.meta_description: Come work with me, Mid-City Community Advocacy Network is hiring for a few positions. Our organizing and civic engagement team is growing! We are hiring forâ€¦
data.text: I tried cutting this clip into shorter segments, but this 21 minutes is so full of relevant information for residents of TN or any other state that would like to weave technology into k-12 education. This 20 minutes will expose you to the "How" of statewide improvement via #advocacy. If you have ever wanted to make an impact, here is the high level blueprint. On behalf of all Tennesseans, thank you Alex Curtis for your unabated efforts in tech advocacy. #thinkdifferntwithdata https://lnkd.in/efkT7jvZ Greater Nashville Technology Council Charles Apigian Shauna Sprague Charlie Yielding
